What You'll Do Elephant Safari, Elephant Breeding center visit, Jungle Walk, Nature walk, Bird watching, Crocodile farm visit, Canoe ride, Tharu culture show Away from the noise and distractions of city life, there is unbelievable peace in the middle of a jungle listening to bird calls and animal sounds. More than 450 species birds are found in the park, among them are peacocks, woodpeckers, hornbills, bengal florican and redheaded trogons. We provide trained naturalists & jungle guides in all jungle tours, who manage and will escort you on these tours.
